name: OR_LNLG_LASER_MASK
description: This table holds whether the surgeon was wearing the appropriate mask during a laser procedure.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_PHYS_USE_MASK_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the surgeon was wearing the appropriate protective mask during a laser case.
